description:
Iva is a glamorous woman who`s kind to girls and strict towards men. http://anidb.net/ch50084 [Yogi] calls her "Iva-neesan", and she`s an older sister figure to the Second Ship crew. She often goes on solo-missions, absolutely loves http://anidb.net/ch50086 [Tsukumo] and will deliver harsh punishment to http://anidb.net/ch50088 [Jiki], who tries to get too close to her.
Source: ANN
name: Iva
